name: Italian Stir Fried Pork & Pasta
author: Smithfield(R)
summary: A stir fry of pork sirloin slices, zucchini, mushrooms, and sun-dried tomatoes is tossed with pasta, Parmesan cheese and fresh basil.
ingredients: 1 (23 ounce) Smithfield® Garlic & Herb Seasoned Pork Sirloin
2 small zucchini, sliced lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch slices
½ cup julienne sliced sun-dried tomatoes
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions
Meanwhile, heat electric skillet or wok to high (400 degrees F
Slice pork sirloin into thin strips; add to heated skillet with oil
Stir-fry until meat is browned, about 5 minutes
Add vegetables, garlic and butter to meat in skillet; stir-fry until vegetables are crisp-tender, about 5 minutes
Drain pasta and add to pork mixture with cheese and basil; toss to coat
